findings.title: Empty ballots are not recorded in Hyperledger
findings.description: If a ballot is recorded in which the voter did not select any candidates, nothing will be saved to Hyperledger.

findings.title: Device IDs not validated against inner request device IDs
findings.description: There is insufficient data validation when processing encrypted requests on the backend server, allowing a user to send requests with another user’s device ID, bypassing protections from the per-device shared secret encryption scheme.

findings.title: Backend Questions
findings.description: This finding raises several backend-related security concerns, including time-throttling at API endpoints, resource exhaustion, device blocking, authentication data association, and more.

findings.title: Unaddressed findings and unverified fixes
findings.description: This section includes brief descriptions of unfixed findings, accepted risks by Voatz, and/or unverifiable fixes due to lack of access to code or infrastructure updates.
